title: Bard
body:
No surprise, Riot make a new champion that is freelo. But for your enemy

{{champion:432}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:432}}

replies.body:
your joking right... hes not that easy to play, his heals are mediocre his stun is short ranged and hard to land, magical journey works for both enemy and ally and last of all his ultimate isn't the easiest to place effectively. There's a reason they are buffing him and probably buffing him more in the future hes not up to par of the other supports. Tell me where i'm wrong.
Bloody sook
maybe gotta read the whole post before replying. I know reading more than 10 words can be hard, but I believe in you
